scripts.seed:sequelize:small: cp .env.sequelize .env; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.seed:sequelize:big: cp .env.sequelize .env; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./src/database/seeders/sequelizeBigDataset
scripts.test:sequelize:small: echo '==========Testing  SEQUELIZE  SMALL DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:sequelize:small; npm run jest
scripts.test:mongo-local:small: echo '==========Testing MONGO-LOCAL SMALL DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:mongo-local:small; npm run jest
scripts.test:mongo-atlas:small: echo '==========Testing MONGO ATLAS SMALL DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:mongo-atlas:small; npm run jest
scripts.test:sequelize:big: echo '==========Testing  SEQUELIZE  BIG DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:sequelize:big; npm run jest
scripts.test:mongo-local:big: echo '==========Testing MONGO-LOCAL BIG DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:mongo-local:big; npm run jest
scripts.test:mongo-atlas:big: echo '==========Testing MONGO ATLAS BIG DATABASE=========='; npm run seed:mongo-atlas:big; npm run jest
scripts.test:small: npm run test:sequelize:small; npm run test:mongo-local:small
scripts.test:big: npm run test:sequelize:big; npm run test:mongo-local:big; npm run test:mongo-atlas:big
